meanings.definition: Published jointly by two or more parties.
meanings.sent1: The copublished book was a collaboration between two authors.
meanings.sent2: The copublished report included contributions from multiple researchers.
meanings.sent3: The copublished magazine was a team effort that brought together different perspectives.
meanings.sent4: The copublished article showcased the combined expertise of the authors.
meanings.sent5: The copublished journal highlighted the shared work of the scientists.

meanings.definition: To publish jointly with another party.
meanings.sent1: They copublished their research findings to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent2: The two companies decided to copublish the new edition of the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The authors copublished their book, making it a joint project.
meanings.sent4: She copublished her article with a renowned expert in the field.
meanings.sent5: The researchers copublished their study, combining their expertise.
